name: 设置聚合表触发配置

labels.name: story
labels.value: 接口名称：聚合表-变量触发

parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '设置聚合表触发配置', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(cms_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/dataconfig/aggregatetable/${get_extract_data(Aggregation_Table_var_Trigger_ID)}/triggers', 'method': 'put', 'json': {'realTime': False, 'triggers': [{'effectiveDateTime': '', 'frequencyValue': 1, 'frequencyUnit': 2, 'matchAll': False, 'condition': 'A1', 'conditionDetail': 1, 'frequencyCheck': False, 'triggerType': 2}]}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}

parameterValues: {'name': '设置聚合表触发配置', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(cms_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/dataconfig/aggregatetable/${get_extract_data(Aggregation_Table_var_Trigger_ID)}/triggers', 'method': 'put', 'json': {'realTime': False, 'triggers': [{'effectiveDateTime': '', 'frequencyValue': 1, 'frequencyUnit': 2, 'matchAll': False, 'condition': 'A1', 'conditionDetail': 1, 'frequencyCheck': False, 'triggerType': 2}]}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}]}
